dmca.title: Copyright violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

________________________________

From: Daniel Powell [mailto:godslittlegirl.godslittlegirl@gmail.com] 
Sent: Thursday, February 15, 2007 8:27 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Copyright violation

 

Hello

 

I would like to report the website CHRISTIANDL.COM
<http://christiandl.com/>  which is hosted by ThePlanet.com servers for
a copyright violation.  The web forum is linking to illegal music and
video downloads which violate the copyright law. 

 

I hope that the web site could be removed as soon as possible to remedy
the violation of copyright law.

 

Thanks,

Daniel.
